artist: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Louis Claude Le Grand
description: Bathsheba at her Toilet; young woman, mostly nude, seated on a rock near a pool at center; turned slightly right and looking at viewer; older woman at right tending to her feet; black woman behind combing hair; peacock at lower left; city right background; King David watching from roof far right
marks:
Signature, and Inscription

above image in black See Inscriptions
title: Print
